name: Abyssal Scout Submarine
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Blueprint cutaway: Abyssal Scout Submarine, top/side/cross-section/decks, ballast, pressure hulls, engines, crew, clean blueprint, fantasy nautical/aeronautical vernacular with realm materials, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, sturdy functional blueprint vernacular, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Use numbered callout pins (01, 02, 03â€¦) instead of long text annotations. Include a clean legend area without rendering complex paragraphs., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Blueprint cutaway of Abyssal Scout Submarine.
callouts: numbered pins 01..10; legend area reserved; no paragraph labels
revised_prompt: Create an image styled like a tabletop role-playing game with a medieval fantasy theme. The image should be a blueprint cutaway view of an Abyssal Scout Submarine, shown from the top, side, and cross-section views displaying the decks, ballast, pressure hulls, and engines. There should be a consistent, painterly collection style used throughout the illustration. Include crew members, using a balanced representation of genders and descents, garbed in culturally coherent gear that aligns with the grounded medieval fantasy materials. The marine vessel should be constructed from fantasy nautical materials, suggestive of underwater caustics with accentuated bioluminescence. Use a color palette of teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and pearl highlights. Avoid any modern technological elements, garbled, random symbols, and sci-fi user interfaces. Rather, stick to meaningful symbols or numbered pins, accompanying with a clean, uncomplicated legend. The end product should embody fantasy aquatic realism and the aesthetic of sturdy blueprint vernacular.
